dialogueLines: I’m upset because you forgot date night.
You really need to listen better — it wasn’t a small thing.
Your sarcasm made it worse when I just wanted you to care.
Let’s talk it out later… after I get some space.
Next time, admit when you’re wrong and just try better.

questions.correctResponse: Correct. You messed up date night.
questions.wrongResponse: Nope. Weather didn’t ruin this — you did.

questions.questionText: What do you need to improve?

questions.wrongResponse: Nope. The sass made it worse.

questions.questionText: What did she ask for before talking again?
questions.wrongResponse: No… she said she needed space, not silence.
Nope. YOU are wrong. That’s the rule.

questions.questionText: What does she want next time?
questions.wrongResponse: Nope. She DEFINITELY didn’t ask for worse.
